column5: Hey All,  Well, after finally getting back to normal, I was able to sort through some 2400 photos that I took in the 8 days I was gone.  On Friday, we took off from Buffalo Int'l Airport. It's a dump, it matches the rest of the town lol. Anyway, once the sun came up this is what I saw....      So, after touching down in Los Angeles, we drove and hour to a suburb call San Gabriel which is on the outskirts in Los Angeles County. My wife's cousin decided to take us on a tour of Hollywood. What I noticed though was the smog. It was everywhere...and everything had a haze...    The next day, my wifes extremely generous cousins drove us to Las Vegas! It was a sight to see!       So after an 8 hour round trip (with my 2 year old in the back seat) we were in Ventura County visiting more relatives....so again, I had to escape, and the coast was phenomenal.        Found this guy hiding    And how could I leave out the fishing pic?     Thanks for reading, I have many many more photos to go through, if you really want to see many more then check out my flickr collection.   Dave
Wow Dave beautiful pictures what camera where you using?
Outstanding pictures, thanks for sharing those.  Joey
Stunning pictures....thanks for sharing, love the one of the surfer....but then agan i like them all.
Great Photos , love the surfer pic as well   TB
Actually......Buffalo isnt a "town", it is actually a city, yup.........we got electricity, malls ....and even airplanes that land and take off from here and just......all kinds of stuff now!!!

Hey Dave, nice photo's.........you know what, I use Buffalo Airport all of the time and think that it is great! Generally quick in and out. It is one of the fastest growing airports in NA! Buffalo is a city that is undergoing renewal and has some fiercely proud residents.........you know, kinda like Kitchener.

Not to mention its only about 10 years old......and quite a little architectural mark. They could have built a box with windows but , i dunno, the comment just doesnt make sense on the airport.  The city.......you may have an arguement, still a jerky thing to say whether its true or not  And just so Im not hi-jacking the thread.........Stunning Pictures Fish'nAuto, anyplace you go from there is really gonna look like a Dump

Okay so the airport isn't a dump....but it's a pain in the backside when they take an hour and a half to get 2 bags and a car seat off the plane...their excuse "we're sorry, two planes arrived at the same time"  Anyway, thanks for the comments guys,
Seriously? I guess that is kinda funny
I use a Canon EOS REBEL XS, most shots were taken with either a 28-80mm and 72-300mm lense
Your shots look very Flickr-y, and that means excellent.  Thanks.
